document.heading: Executive Service Compensation Amendment Act of 2011

history.narrative: Law 19-83, the “Executive Service Compensation Amendment Act of 2011”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-44, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations and the Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 1, 2011, and December 6, 2011, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 16, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 19-243 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-83 became effective on February 24, 2012.
